name: Fruit Splash - Pop Saga
description:
Fruit Splash is a very addictive connect lines puzzle game!
Connect colorful lines of fruit to solve compelling levels in this puzzle adventure!
Ready for some Juice Splash? Smash Jelly, Splash fruits!

***FEATURES of Fruit Splash***
- 100+ well-designed levels. More challenging levels will coming soon.
- Fresh and lovely fruits
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Exciting and delicious fruit trip.
- Stunning effects and smooth gameplay
- Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups
- Play with your Friends
- Share your score with your Facebook friends
- Completely Free

***HOW TO PLAY Fruit Splash***
- Get the Target Score - Swipe Fruits and Splash them to reach the required score and get the stars
- Timed Levels - Get the targets before the time runs out
- Collect Drinks - Crush the Candy and collect all the Drinks
- Dirty Sugar Crush - Destroy all the Dirty Sugar Candy blocks
- Sugar Bomb - destroy Sugar Bomb until they explode
- Jelly Cage - break Jelly Cages
- Connect lines of delicious and colorful fruits to make amazing fruit blast.
- Use powerful boosters to help you to clear obstacles.
- Easy at begin but more challenging comes soon, can you score 3 stars on every level?
- Do not forget share you high scores to social network, have fun!!

***BOOSTERS***
- Juice Blast - Gives +5 extra moves
- Jelly Party - Gives +30 seconds
- Juice Splash - replace some Jelly Fruit colors
- Candy Swipe - Crushes all Candy in a cross lines
- Sweet Crush Shovel - Crush 1 item in the game
- Boom: Destroying 1 item on game field
- Fruit Pop: get a multicolor bomb on the playing field at the start of the game
- Colorful Fruit: crush & jam all fruits have same color
- Fruit Blast Line: crush & jam all fruits on the puzzle row
- Super Juice Blast: crush & jam all fruits both row & line

So join this fruit world, match 3 or more fruits in this puzzle of lines!
